sadsop: ^A guy in weird getup is cruising alongside you on a weirdly high-quality scooter and trying to talk at you through your window.
watch: ^He sees you watching him and starts gesticulating faster, throwing out hand symbols and gestures so wildly you have no clue what he's trying to say.

keep_watching_success: ^He gives up on trying to talk to you, cruising away on his overly-decked out bike. Seems your cool unresponsiveness impressed him, though, because he left behind a little gift.
keep_watching_fail: ^Angered by you blatantly ignoring him, he punches the window! Time to retaliate.

open_window: ^"Finally!" He exclaims when you roll down the window. "Even the worst SADsOP initiates aren't as slow as you guys. You know SADsOP? They're—including me—the best."
^He says a bunch more nonsense, then finally ends it with: "Where y'all headed?"

answer_honestly: ^"That's what's up," he says, offering you a handshake and a bag of... something. "I gotta get going now, but this was fun. See ya around!"
answer_dishonestly: ^"Hmm. Sounds fake but ok! Keep going where you're going, am I right?" He doesn't give you a chance to respond before nodding sagely, tossing you a bag of... something, and blasting away on his motor-scooter.

speed_up: ^He seems to take this as a challenge, increasing his speed to match yours. That must be one highly modded scooter.

keep_speeding: ^You match pace with each other for a couple minutes, blasting across the highway, until finally he yells something completely unintelligible and pulls away. Goodbye, weirdo.
^Looks like he left gift on the back of your RV somehow.
stop_abruptly: ^You slam the brakes as abruptly as you
^can without tipping the car over. The dude seems shocked as he speeds past, but then laughs and continues on at the same pace, leaving you in the dust.
^Looks like he managed to sneak a little 'gift' onto the back of your car at some point.

run_over: ^He reacts pretty badly to you trying to run him over. Looks like you'll have to earn the right to do it.
